nodes.text: {action_listen}, that {item_backpack} of yours looks {quality_heavy}. This {location_town} can be {quality_tough} on newcomers. Here, {action_take} this {item_vest}. It's {quality_sturdy}. A {action_welcome} {item_gift}.
